name: Meta partner d.o.o.
goal: Meta partner je konzultantsko poduzeće za podršku razvoju ulaganja, unaprjeđenju poslovnih procesa, regulatornom usklađivanju, razvojne i strategija financiranja za privatni i javni sektor. Više od 20 godina iskustva u raznim sektorima i industrijama je utkano u naš cjelokupni rad i u isporuke za svakog klijenta - bez obzira na veličinu, oblik i "važnost" organizacije.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: GDPR, EU competition law, State Aid, enlargement, structural funds, ESIF, EU programmes
